channel.title: The Umerican Road Atlas and Umerica Unnatura
channel.description:
Check out this kick starter:
In my opinion Umerican is one of the best current generation OSR![issue12cover-web|323x500](upload://h6JdXkgg3dSKfAruda9rdIuEYRS.jpeg) . It takes DCC and puts you in a crazy apocalyptic world full of cannibal fast food clowns and mutants.
The Umerican Road Atlas and Umerica Unnatural, via @Kickstarter https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/276689953/the-umerican-road-atlas-and-umerica-unnatural
